texts.name: Collivea
texts.biography: When young Collivea joined the forces of Nighon, Warlocks were amazed to find out that she's resistant to the look of a Medusa. That settled her career as an Overlord.

specialty.description:
{Medusas and Medusa Queens}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Medusas and Medusa Queens for each level attained after 4th level. Additionally, Medusas and Medusa Queens get a permanent +1 Speed bonus.
specialty.name: Medusas
